snippet.title: Neverlooted Dungeon -  Trailer - Dungeon Crawler Immersive Sim
snippet.description:
NEW TRAILER: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vlXeQ26yuPw

🔔 Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1171980?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=nl_trailer3
💬 Join the Discord: https://discord.com/invite/FpXESF7

Composer: Alexandre Sciré: https://alexandrescire.bandcamp.com/
Illustration: David Alvarez: https://www.artstation.com/david_alvarez


Neverlooted Dungeon is a modern first-person dungeon crawler immersive sim, taking its roots in games like Ultima Underworld, Arx Fatalis, but also in D&D role playing game. It uniquely focuses on treacherous deadly traps, physics-based obstacles, and great freedom of action. 

Venture deep into a massive dungeon full of deadly traps, mystery and secrets, find your own creative ways to overcome its dangers and be the first to loot!
